website_summaries.verdict: Comes at a fraction of the price of other models with no difference in quality, making it a great deal.
pros: Showcases an aesthetically pleasing thistle design in a variety of color combinations
Made of fabric that is soft to the touch and machine-washable
cons: Our testers found that some of the color combinations didn't match their descriptions, making it difficult to match bathroom décor

customer_reviews.title: Instantly class up the joint
customer_reviews.text: Got the blue accent/gray background option. Looks amazing in person. It's long-ish, so on my setup it reaches the ground. Gives an otherwise stark, boring and small rental apartment bathroom a cozy and adult feel! Pair it with the "no more mildew" liner and some nice metal rolling rings and it's perfect. Nice material, too. Will update review if anything goes awry with it.
customer_reviews.author: luciditycheck

customer_reviews.title: Still alive and well 5 years after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Just browsing for a new shower curtain because my current one is 5 almost five years old (yikes!)..and happens to be this curtain! Realized I never left a review & decided I should. It goes without saying that having the same shower curtain for five years speaks on its durability. I’ve washed it countless times (air dry) and there’s not a single thread out of place. Zero mildew. Super pretty and would buy it again but looking for a much overdo change. Def. recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: S. A.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: The material is thick and durable. it is actually a little wider than the average shower curtain which is nice b/c is covers the entire bath tub, with no gaps. The colors are very vibrant. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a great price! It instantly made my somewhat outdated bathroom in the town house I rent, feel like it was updated! I get compliments on it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize this was a shower curtain until after I had placed my order, I just got carried away with my obsession of the blue and gray color combination and keep it as a long drape across two of my corner windows. Weird place to find a shower curtain, but I think it looks cool haha :)
customer_reviews.author: Helen Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: BEAUTIFUL shower curtain, though a tad on the THIN side. One star off for it being thin. We don't have a ceiling light over the shower this is being used for, but if we did I would add a liner to the inside of it for privacy.
customer_reviews.author: WiseCrew

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, works better than I thought it would at first. I thought we would have to put in a liner to use it, but it is just fine on its own. We will probably get a liner for it so it doesn't try to creep in on us when hackers kicks on, but even when it does, it keeps the water where it should be. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you’re having second thoughts, keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is mediocre. Standing inside the shower looking out, I can see through it. If you think you need the long one, you should probably buy the long one. This is the first shower curtain that I have had that is this short. There are no metal hanger holes. It’s not that cute. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Khalei

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a win
customer_reviews.text: I like it, the kid likes it, and the girl friend likes it. Seems like a win to me. Install was easy, material felt good and the design is not faded and blurry looking like so many that I looked at in the local chain stores. Compares to the curtains I found locally that are $40 plus, so can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Goatmagic

customer_reviews.title: Nice😍
customer_reviews.text: Loved the design so much that even though I knew it is a shower curtain I ordered 2 to put on my daughters window. I added a blackout curtain and it looks great & Matches the color scheme of her room
customer_reviews.author: Adriana s.

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom Decor
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to redo my bathroom for as long as we have lived in this house (almost 2 years). I love the way this shower curtain looks in my bathroom. It is actually pretty heavy so it protects the way you would want it to, and it is just such an adorable design! It hangs super well and the quality is just much better than anything I have seen in my local stores. I am so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Bought this for our guest bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Bought this for our guest bathroom. Very true to color and the teal blue really pops against the grey. I was afraid it would be too dark once you were in the shower but it seems almost see-through from that side and lets in a lot of light so you aren't showering in the dark. We've had a lot of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and quality
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain set the theme for a surprise redecoration in my mother’s bathroom while she was away on vacation. The quality is very good and the material is thick enough to keep in the water but moves and drapes like cloth. Instead of seeing a shower from her bed she sees a big beautiful picture. She loves her new bathroom theme with this shower curtain as the centerpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Ivygirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful well-made shower curtain I bought this as a gift for my sister who is very picky and she loved it was a great price for the shower curtain and she thought I paid a buttload of money for it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but disappointed with the different color
customer_reviews.text: Nice however, it's much darker than I expected. Looking at the picture advertised, it appeared to be a soft/light grey. I prefer it to have been the light grey. I guess I'll keep it, even though I was slightly disappointed with the dark color.
customer_reviews.author: Shun

customer_reviews.title: Love this shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it was the cheapest fabric one that had a cute design. I was NOT disappointed. It not only goes great in the bathroom, but it's made well and I'm glad I went with this one regardless of the price. Quite honestly I feel like I got a great deal and that's always is fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shower curtain. The material feels clothlike, yet durable. I have not washed it yet, so not sure how durable it is after wash, but it looks nice in my bathroom. I may purchase another one in a different style/pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Tsnacker

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty I believe it will last you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy, good design is exactly is picture, didn't see any problem as reported by others with the decals coming loose? I think it's just a beautiful shower curtain. We purchase some gray bath mats to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: It's always a gamble when you buy something like this. It looks very nice in person
customer_reviews.text: It's always a gamble when you buy something like this. It looks very nice in person, isn't thin or see through, the print on it looks great, no stitching issues ect. You need to buy shower rings separately though.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors and great modern look
customer_reviews.text: Really nice vibrant colors with a very modern look. I installed this in our newly remodeled bathroom and am very happy with it so far. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Stabbin

customer_reviews.title: Great shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful shower curtain! It is much of a darker grey than the pic! I've had it for about a month now and no issues! Also as others have said " the print was messed up..." I think it's just part of the design and it's not really noticeable nor does it look horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: Excellent print quality and very durable.  Not 100% waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for almost a year and a half. No mildew or mold. Print holds up very well. I have not washed mine so I can't say how well it is machine washable. Not 100% waterproof, but does a very good job. I would recommend a liner to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Vandergriff

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS JUST LIKE THE PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty shower curtain. I only rated it 4 stars since I haven't had it very long I cannot truly attest to the durability or quality of the material I can only go by initial appearance.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Just as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain looks just like the picture. It does let some light through it, which I like. That also means it isn't very thick fabric, so it might not last forever. I haven't tried to wash it yet. It is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this curtain
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is very pretty. I bought it for my guest bathroom. At first, I bought it on Wayfair for twice the cost. It took so long for delivery with Wayfair, I canceled the order. It met my expectations when it arrived. I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: NerfMom

customer_reviews.title: Great product would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just like pic the colors are very vibrant and then I added blue curtain hooks to add a little pop even though they are not quite the same color blue as the curtain but it still looks nice! Have not washed it yet but it seems like good quality material as well.
customer_reviews.author: aryiha

customer_reviews.title: I love this shower curtain!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a beautiful shower curtain! It looks even better in person than in the pictures from the listing. The colors are so bold and vibrant it really makes my bathroom pop. This shower curtain I have found also is easy to color coordinate with other bathroom articles, it goes with any color pattern not just gray! It is also very soft and high quality fabric. This was a great purchase I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors !
customer_reviews.text: It’s not a very thick curtain, kinda sheer but it is absolutely beautiful . It was perfect for our newly fresh painted bluish/grey bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME COLOR
customer_reviews.text: NOT THE SAME AS PICTURED. The light grey in the picture is MUCH MUCH darker. The product packaging has the same picture and it is a completely different color than the one shown. This interfered with my other products I purchased with the same color scheme in mind. However, the shower curtain is reasonably priced, well made, and still looks neat. The picture just needs updated.
customer_reviews.author: Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent curtain with vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower curtain. I bought the dark gray version with light blue, white, and black plants. It is just as shown in the picture, and the colors are vivid and edges well-defined. It takes 12 shower hooks, and on my shower hangs a little bit shorter than the floor (that will vary depending on your shower bar's height, of course). The material is lightweight but seems sturdy. I love it, especially paired with the stone pebble shower hooks. This is a great curtain. I strongly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: James Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice material not super thick but not thin at all. This shower curtain took my cheap little apartment bathroom to another level. The color is as it appears. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Got this because it went with our color theme in the bathroom and had a nice design to it. Does the job and looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful curtain for the bathroom ... I actually bought 2 so I could put one up immediately when washing the other.
customer_reviews.author: CBM

customer_reviews.title: pretty curtain that won't stare at you while you potty.
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend staying with me a while back and he decided to be nice and buy me a shower curtain.. I don't like Duck Dynasty nor do I have a desire to watch it so I have no idea why he bought me a Duck Dynasty shower curtain but after a while of having bearded rednecks staring at me going potty I decided to get a new curtain of my own choice. It is a nice pretty curtain and it doesn't make me feel insecure while going potty.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great shower curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my guest bathroom and it looks great! Exactly as pictured. Love the colors in this shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and it fit well. I read previous reviews about the color and they are correct, this is a brownish gray and darker than pictured, so be aware of that if you order. I liked it and it will blend in with my browns and grays in my bathroom, but if you are looking for more of a gray and not brown, you will not like this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Almost over 2 years and 2 washes later and it's still beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower curtain. The colors really pop and it's very well made. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rugbychic216

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: I'd been wanting a design like this in my bathroom for quite some time, and after searching around online, I found this curtain. It's fabric, so you will need a plastic liner, but I had one anyway. The only issue I've noticed - and I don't think it's the curtain itself - is that the weight of the curtain + liner is sometimes enough to pull apart my curtain rings (purchased at the chain of stores that begins with T and has a red logo, similar to these: , but I suspect that's a defect in the ring, not the curtain. :)
customer_reviews.author: C. Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I wound up returning this. I thought based on the picture that it was silver with a little shine to it and that the thistles were a light blue, white, and black. When I received the shower curtain I was dissapointed to find that it was flat dark grey and the thistles were bright turquoise blue, white and black (which practically blended into the dark grey). The curtain material was not as nice quality as I wanted and the colors were not right for my master bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made and beautiful shower curtain. I would recommend this to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Excellent curtain
customer_reviews.text: Simple, soft, long enough and no mold! What else I can ask for in a shower curtain!
customer_reviews.author: pheobe_s

customer_reviews.title: Love it, the color changes with the type of ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the color changes with the type of lighting you have. First I was disappointed that it was a dark brown (but I do have dark brown towels), so then it was OK. I turned on a different light in the bathroom and it matched my gray towels. Regardless, It's great!
customer_reviews.author: NorthStar

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Matches my bathroom perfectly. Durable & easy to clean. Really like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha D

customer_reviews.title: Its very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I did not test the water resistance, only because I already have a liner for the inside, but i really like this. It looks beautiful, just like it is pictured
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It's a fabric shower curtain and the design is beautiful. It definitely looks like I spent more on ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased during a lightning sale so this was quite a deal! It's a fabric shower curtain and the design is beautiful. It definitely looks like I spent more on it than I did and the bathroom really brightened from the pop of color against the gray background. Happy with my purchase as I usually spend more for a shower curtain and never really cared for the designs. This I love!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Disario

customer_reviews.title: I like the shower curtain design and it was delivered promptly
customer_reviews.text: I like the shower curtain design and it was delivered promptly, but the gray is far darker than any of the pictures indicate. It really is almost black. If that fits with your décor than it is a very nice curtain for the price. It look pretty harsh in my bathroom but my husband had hung it up before I saw it and I didn't have the heart to take it down yet.
customer_reviews.author: ltlbit44

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product, changes the entire look of the bathroom. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN M.

customer_reviews.title: It's great
customer_reviews.text: Color is a bit off from picture, more dark. But looks great in my new remodeled bathroom. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Walker

customer_reviews.title: Can see through
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, very pretty but it has some stains on the inside of the curtain that are very visible from the inside. Also it is alot more see through than we were expecting.
customer_reviews.author: helpful advice

customer_reviews.title: quality is the worst
customer_reviews.text: dont buy this product first of all it doesnt comes with hangers and the quality is very cheap and it doesnt worth that money!
customer_reviews.author: Harut

customer_reviews.title: Made my new bathroom pop!
customer_reviews.text: A gorgeous addition to my new master bath, this curtain is lovely to look at and lovely to the touch. My bath, which is silver-gray and light blue, got quite a lift from this modern-motif curtain. Colors in photo are true; be aware that the curtain is rather dark so, if you're considering buying it, you might want to ensure that your room is light. Very happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: LH16

customer_reviews.title: Color isn’t what it looks like in pictures. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even take it out of the package. Look to be light blue in pictures but was actually aqua blue. Description just says blue (not even close).
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Bierhals

customer_reviews.title: Great look!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful❤ I love it. Bright and very well made. No hooks included.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color's brings elegance to the bathroom. Will order again
customer_reviews.author: PA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Nice shower curtain at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant colors. Pattern was clean and well printed. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melvin I Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The shower curtain is awesome! It is water resistant and has a flow to it like window curtains have. The color is so pretty. I just love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Color on the teal is a little more muted than the picture would indicate, but it is still a cute shower curtain that is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Narclithid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and a great shower curtain for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Matches our 60s style bathroom perfectly. Was worried with other customers comments and pictures that the blue would be too bright but I'm assuming they must have had a flash on because it's not electric colored teal like shown in others comments. Very sharp looking. Shipping was quicker than expected which is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and colors!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this design! I previously had a white color shower curtain and moved to a new apartment so I decided to purchase this one. I didn’t want to spend a lot of money as I already had a functioning curtain but rather just change up my décor so I went with this one. It really completes my bathroom and the picture matches the product perfectly. I would recommend this shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Molly L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The love the material , print ,length,color looks great in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: janet varady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design, bright color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and I like how it doesn't come with shower hooks attached. Some people might not like that but I like to keep my shower hooks and use them with other curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Brenkman

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but....
customer_reviews.text: Pretty design but mine came with stitching defect ( see pic) Great customer service took care of it. A little thin sure it would hold up to a washing but that that also means it will dry faster. I’m super happy with the colors and design.
customer_reviews.author: HRB

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and does what it's supposed to do. That's all you really need with a shower curtain.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and does what it's supposed to do. That's all you really need with a shower curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Some smart guy

customer_reviews.title: Bought to update my girls' bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing in person. It's a little bit lighter gray (background) but still stunning. As previously noted in other reviews. You can get matching rugs at Target. I went a step further and added a pop of color with a golden yellow accent. It made the bathroom playful yet still beautiful. I also bought the Umbra Pluff Wall Decor, Set of 9, and spray painted them the blue and yellow for added playfulness. I get compliments anytime someone new sees their bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but color not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower curtain, but as everyone says, the color is a lot darker. It is closer to black than gray. This means everything I bought to go with it doesn't quite match. A lot of people have said that this is really thin material. But I've had thinner materials before. It doesn't mean that it won't last.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Pinsky

customer_reviews.title: Using as a closet door
customer_reviews.text: Love the design. I got this to use in place of a closet door in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Caiti49

customer_reviews.title: I read the other reviews but...
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that this purchase would make an already dark bathroom even darker - especially after reading the reviews. Turns out, it is not black, like other reviews read, it is truly gray...a really, really nice gray! Also, the blue is more of a really nice bright baby blue, not so much turquoise as it seems in the picture, but I still love it! It is thin so it worked out well and was not an issue with light. I highly recommend, I love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: kmg

customer_reviews.title: Great look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. The design looks very nice. I like that it's not a vinyl material like most of the lower priced shower curtains are. It's polyester and I think that's great because it has the nicer look of a fabric curtain, but still dries quickly. I think the picture accurately depicts the color. The blue is a near-perfect match with a bath mat I found at Target.
customer_reviews.author: mrandmrscoooool

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: My apartment is old and needed some distractions to hide the age, this shower curtain was a perfect addition. Though I will say the gray is a little darker then what appears on Amazon, I found another website that more accurately depicts the true color so I wasn't surprised when it arrived. and don't let the polyester fool you, I had a very nice cotton shower curtain and it's a pain to clean and iron every time you have to wash it, so I'm all about the polyester now.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good bought these to match pictures i bought off of amazon for the rest room looks really good
customer_reviews.author: C Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: I like this curtain for colors and durability of it. It is great for a couple. I would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice just the colors that I needed for my bathroom I order the gray
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This curtain was very cute but for some reason it started getting snags all over it without even being washed yet. Not sure why. Eventually had to throw it away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and high quality
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little extra work to install with having to cut it to length but then having a solid one piece shower rod is much stronger than the expandable/adjustable ones. Plus there is no joint for the curtain rod hooks to catch on when opening and closing.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this it was on back order and took weeks to get. Once I got it I love the colors and it doesn’t make it any darker in the shower than my other ones!
customer_reviews.author: Princess5

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking curtain!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Just wish it wasn’t as wrinkled when it arrived. But apart from that the colors are exactly as shown and look beautiful. Love the product
customer_reviews.author: Kaushik

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing bc of the reviews. I am so happy that I actually said freak it. I searched and searched for a shower curtain to match my ugly 2nd bathroom. It has that old blue tile. This shower curtain def does the job of taking your eye off the tile and matches it perfect. I went with this shower curtain and Pinzon Egyptian Cotton Gray towels n my ugly spare bath is now beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Malia

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, just unhappy with the color
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize quite how dark the grey of the background is. In the light it actually looks a little more brown. Nice quality, just unhappy with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Novaturient

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Perfect and Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I searched and searched for the PERFECT shower stall curtain. Found It!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald A.

customer_reviews.title: My bathroom now looks sophsicated and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: Maaan these shower curtain is nice! really really nice!! Quality is there. design is there, everything with it is there. BRAND NEW off course and more. It really makes my bathroom more sophiscated! Yup more sophiscated. The honez all love it! I'm glad I picked them up. It matches well with my soft soft thermo opressure navy blue rugs etc. IDK what else to say. PICK IT UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: sTaLwArT 420

customer_reviews.title: Great for our house
customer_reviews.text: This what just what I wanted to update my bathroom from dap to fab
customer_reviews.author: MissCrystal

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the main bath. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: See through thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, see through! Didn’t expect it to be quite so thin but I love the colors and design for my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors, works better than I thought keep in mind I always use a liner with every shower curtain, the material of the liner feels like a good quality. Pleased
customer_reviews.author: Lyz#12

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This shower curtain is perfect and exactly what I was looking for! It’s good quality and not cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Simons

customer_reviews.title: We bought blue towels and rugs that went beautifully with this shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: Our problem was gray tile, but we had a curtain that was blue/grey. We bought blue towels and rugs that went beautifully with this shower curtain. The bathroom looks "designer," NOT "quick fix." I gave 4 stars because in a month of use, the wrinkles have not gone away. However, I would buy it again for the color coordinates.
customer_reviews.author: Berk

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's long, it's waterproof, it's a shower curtain. Nothing to complain about!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Material is cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I like the design but wasn't thrilled with the material. For something that used to be $21 bucks the material is like something you'd get at DG. It was not shiny and thick like I thought
customer_reviews.author: Clare Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I hung it up last night and this morning I noticed snags in the material. Upon closer inspection there were quite a few the fabric seems really cheap. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: fxcbb

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying this curtain. It is extremely light weight fabric ...
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this curtain. It is extremely light weight fabric which repels the water well. I may coat it with some Scotch Guard soon, as a security measure. The size was not listed. It’s 72” X 72”.
customer_reviews.author: KindnessCounts

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 100% cotton and hate them because you have to iron them after washing or they look like crap. Not this one!! It is very lightweight and wash and dry and come out perfect and ready to hang. I love the look of it. I say the blue is a aqua/sky blue much like the photo depending on your monitor setting. I bought it hoping to mach the bathmat I had and I say it was dang near right on.
customer_reviews.author: Hondacat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's beautiful and is a pretty awesome quality for the price. I've had it a few months now and it's great. Hasn't frayed or ripped or anything. Update. I have had this 4-5 months and it still looks like I bought it yesterday. No mold or mildew on it, no rips still so I am very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin Swirsky

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower curtain. The material is strong and soft, the colors were perfect. I remodeled my whole bathroom to accomidate this shower curtain haha. Now my bathroom is my favorite room in the house. It's dark, yes, but with lighter walls, everything POPS! I would suggest this curtain to anyone due to its elegance and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Quality Shower Curtain, Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower curtain almost a year ago and it has held up well. The colors are as shown in the picture and the quality is good. Would definitely purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Allykat

customer_reviews.title: Great shower curtain
customer_reviews.text: Great shower curtain. Love the color. Only issue is finding a rug to match. I thought the background color was gray but it is really a dark brown, almost chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: This was paper thin! The blue was a funky blue that is very hard to match to towels. Hate it and would return it if I wasn't so lazy to repackage it. Spend a few more dollars and get another bathroom curtain.
customer_reviews.author: R. Salas

customer_reviews.title: Great Shower Curtain
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty shower curtain. The colors work really well together except that it is very hard to find matching patters to decorate or piece the rest of the bathroom together with this curtain. I wish there was a bathroom rug set to go along with this curtain to make it a little easier to out fit the room. Does the job and helps keep water in the tub/shower where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This is gorgeous exactly what I wanted in my master bathroom to match my bedroom
customer_reviews.author: mechelle Banville

customer_reviews.title: Darker than expected
customer_reviews.text: The color on the picture and description don’t seem to match up with actual print. I was expecting MUCH lighter Grey and my picture was fuzzy. Don’t buy unless you have lots of natural light or a light inside your shower.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Positive feedback
customer_reviews.text: Awesome look for my bathroom I thought the design was a real but it's more of a light sky blue
customer_reviews.author: Colina Malika Bean

product_meta.title: iDesign Thistle Floral Fabric Bathroom Shower Curtain - 72" x 72", Gray/Blue
product_meta.description: Size:StandardAdd a touch of style and function to your bathroom with the iDesign Thistle Floral Fabric Bathroom Shower Curtain. Made with soft 100% polyester, this woven fabric shower curtain features rust-resistant metal grommets and a reinforced header for durability, and it is recommended for use with a liner to keep water in the shower and off of your bathroom floors. It is fast-drying, wrinkle-resistant, and machine-washable for easy care and convenience, and it is also mold and mildew resistant. This versatile shower curtain can be used with any style hook including C-hooks, S-hooks, or roller rings and is compatible with both straight and curved curtain rods. The dark gray, light blue, and white floral design matches a variety of bathroom decor styles. This standard-sized shower curtain measures 72" x 72" and is ideal for home, apartment, college, and dorm bathrooms. With iDesign by InterDesign, you can #LiveSimply every day.
feature_bullets: DURABLE FABRIC SHOWER CURTAIN: Features rust-resistant metal grommets and a reinforced header for durability and is recommended for use with a liner to keep water off of your bathroom floors
MACHINE-WASHABLE: Soft 100% polyester fabric is fast-drying, wrinkle-resistant, and machine-washable for easy care and convenience
MOLD AND MILDEW RESISTANT: Resists mold and mildew build up to help keep the shower clean
DECORATIVE FLORAL DESIGN: Dark gray, light blue, and white floral pattern matches a variety of bathroom decor styles
STANDARD SIZE: Measures 72" x 72" and is ideal for standard-sized showers and bathtubs
